channel.title: Graydon Carter on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Puck Nears Deal to Acquire Graydon Carter’s Air Mail
item.description: The media company focused on the vectors of power and influence is closing in on a deal to acquire the media company co-founded by the former Vanity Fair editor.
